level.heading: Scope of practice for refrigeration and air conditioning mechanics.
level.text: For the purposes of this part, the term "refrigeration and air conditioning mechanic" means a person who designs, installs, maintains or alters mechanical systems for refrigeration or air conditioning of any public or private building or vehicle.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-261, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 47-2801.
